attributes.action: Prosecute Hazel Blears for Tax Fraud
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hazel Blears knowingly mis-led the tax office/Inland Revenue in relation to her primary/2nd property and whilst she has subsequently made payment, her intentions were deliberate.  Therefore I believe Hazel Blears should be prosecuted for Tax Fraud.

rejection.details: Government cannot prosecute individuals or organisations. It is the role of the police to investigate suspected crimes, and the role of the Crown Prosecution Service to decide whether there is a case to answer, and to prosecute.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
